body_html:
As it says "Please install GPU version of TF"
Tensorflow magically cannot run on GPU and i don't know much about your environment . You also have to make sure correct nvidia drivers have been installed.
Please follow these instructions from here and for the right OS. Use anaconda if possible.
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/ and post your comments on stack overflow instead of raising an issue

body:
As it says "Please install GPU version of TF"
Tensorflow magically cannot run on GPU and i don't know much about your environment . You also have to make sure correct nvidia drivers have been installed.  
Please follow these instructions from here and for the right OS. Use anaconda if possible. 
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/   and post your comments on stack overflow instead of raising an issue
